briefTitle: Effect of Statin Therapy on Disease Progression in Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease (ADPKD)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 8-22 years
* Autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease
* Normal kidney function

Exclusion Criteria:

* Abnormal kidney function
* Past allergic history to medications used in study
* Liver disease
* Muscle disease/dystrophy
* Pregnancy, planned pregnancy, or lactation within study period
* Inability to cooperate with or clinical contraindication for magnetic resonance imaging

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent of Participants Demonstrating 20% or More Increase in Total Kidney Volume
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of participants demonstrating 20% or more increase in total kidney volume corrected for height, left ventricular mass index, or urinary albumin excretion over the three year study period

Left Ventricular Mass Index
